synopsis.text: Haruka, a cheerful high school student, moves to the sunny beaches of Okinawa and discovers a passion for beach volleyball. Despite her towering height, she's determined to form a winning duo with her cousin, Kanata. However, Kanata, once a passionate volleyball player, has abandoned the sport due to her short stature. As the two cousins navigate their insecurities, they must learn to trust each other on the sandy court and strive to overcome their fears in time for the junior championship. Can Haruka and Kanata rekindle their love for the game and become the formidable team they once were? Join them on their journey of self-discovery, friendship, and the thrilling world of competitive beach volleyball.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
